condose@loccitane.me>; Geraldin AYAP <Geraldin.Ayap@loccitane.me>; Kristina Kalcheva <Kristina.Kalcheva@Loccitane.Me>
Subject: Mall Permit Rejection L'Occitane TDM - Expired insurance certificate 
 

Dear Hagop,

 

Greetings!

 

I wanted to let you know that our permit request for the L'Occitane Dubai Mall store was rejected because the store's compliance documents had expired. Please send the renewed store insurance certificate so that we can update the store records with the mall operation team and obtain the permit approval.

 



 

 

Looking forward to your kind reply

 

Kind regards,

 

SALWA AL MAMARI​​​​	 
ASSOCIATE ‑ ADMINISTRATION	 
REAL EMIRATES LLC	 
DUBAI	 
‑	 
UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

aldin.Ayap@loccitane.me> >; Kristina Kalcheva <Kristina.Kalcheva@Loccitane.Me <mailto:Kristina.Kalcheva@Loccitane.Me> >
Subject: Mall Permit Rejection L'Occitane TDM - Expired insurance certificate 

 

Dear Hagop,

 

Greetings!

 

I wanted to let you know that our permit request for the L'Occitane Dubai Mall store was rejected because the store's compliance documents had expired. Please send the renewed store insurance certificate so that we can update the store records with the mall operation team and obtain the permit approval.

 



 

 

Looking forward to your kind reply

 

Kind regards,

 

SALWA AL MAMARI​​​​

ASSOCIATE ‑ ADMINISTRATION

REAL EMIRATES LLC

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

+971 4 387 2000

+97145632034

chunks.text:
aldin.Ayap@loccitane.me> >; Kristina Kalcheva <Kristina.Kalcheva@Loccitane.Me <mailto:Kristina.Kalcheva@Loccitane.Me> >
Subject: Mall Permit Rejection L'Occitane TDM - Expired insurance certificate 

 

Dear Hagop,

 

Greetings!

 

I wanted to let you know that our permit request for the L'Occitane Dubai Mall store was rejected because the store's compliance documents had expired. Please send the renewed store insurance certificate so that we can update the store records with the mall operation team and obtain the permit approval.

 



 

 

Looking forward to your kind reply

 

Kind regards,

 

SALWA AL MAMARI​​​​

ASSOCIATE ‑ ADMINISTRATION

REAL EMIRATES LLC

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

+971 4 387 2000

+97145632034
